channel.title: invertebrate // powerviolence // grindcore // hate
channel.description: Invertebrate is a 3-piece band based in Oakland, CA. We play a mix of powerviolence, grindcore, and sludge music. We hate pretty much everything.

item.title: Posting from my phone, bitch.
item.description: This is a test. I posted this from my phone. If you don’t think that’s the tightest shit, then fuck you.
